SystemProperty.description: Enter the GSTIN or UIN of the receiver. E.g. 05AEJPP8087R1ZF. Check that the registration is active on the date of the invoice from GST portal
Enter the name of the receiver

Enter the Invoice number of invoices issued to registered recipients. Ensure that the format is alpha-numeric with allowed special characters of slash(/) and dash(-) .The total number of characters should not be more than 16.
Enter date of invoice in DD-MMM-YYYY. E.g. 24-May-2017.
Enter the total value indicated in the invoice of the supplied goods or services- with 2 decimal Digits.
Select the code of the state from drop down list for the place of supply.
Please select Y or N , if the supplies/services are subject to tax as per reverse charge mechanism.
If the supply is eligible to be taxed at 65% of the existing rate of tax, select '65%' from dropdown; else blank.
Select from the dropdown whether the supply is regular, or to a SEZ unit/developer with or without payment of tax or deemed export.
Enter the GSTIN of the e-commerce company if the supplies are made through an e-Commerce operator.
Enter the combined (State tax + Central tax) or the integrated tax, as applicable.
Enter the taxable value of the supplied goods or services for each rate line item - with 2 decimal Digits, The taxable value has to be computed as per GST valuation provisions.
Enter the total Cess amount collected/payable.

Enter the Revised Invoice number of invoices issued to registered recipients. Ensure that the format is alpha-numeric with allowed special characters of slash(/) and dash(-) .The total number of characters should not be more than 16.
Enter date of invoice in DD-MMM-YYYY. E.g. 24-May-2017.
In the Type column, enter E if the supply is done through E-Commerce or else enter OE (other than E-commerce).
Select the financial year
Select the Month

Enter original invoice number Reported in B2B section of earlier period/current tax period or pre-GST period against which credit/debit note is issued. Incase of refund voucher please enter the related advance receipt voucher number.
Enter the original invoice/advance receipt date in DD-MMM-YYYY. E.g. 24-May-2017.
Enter the credit/debit note number or the refund voucher number. Ensure that the format is alpha-numeric with allowed special characters of slash(/) and dash(-) of maximum length of 16 characters.
Enter credit/debit note/Refund voucher date in DD-MMM-YYYY. E.g. 24-May-2017.
In the document Type column, enter 'D' if the note is Debit note, enter 'C' if note is credit note or enter 'R' for refund voucher.
Amount should be with only up to 2 decimal digits.
Select whether the credit/debit note is related to pre-GST supplies.

Enter the revised credit/debit note number or the refund voucher number. Ensure that the format is alpha-numeric with allowed special characters of slash(/) and dash(-) of maximum length of 16 characters.
Enter revised credit/debit note/Refund voucher date in DD-MMM-YYYY. E.g. 24-May-2017.
Intra State
Select the type of supply to Unregistered Taxpayers (UR) against which the document has been issued.'EXPWP' represents Export with payment and 'EXPWOP' represent Export without payment.
In the Type column, enter WPAY if the Export is with payment of tax or else enter WOPAY.
Enter the six digit code of port through which goods were exported. Please refer to the list of port codes available on the GST common portal. This is not required in case of export of services.
Enter the unique reference number of shipping bill. This information if not available at the timing of submitting the return the same may be left blank and provided later.

Enter the date of shipping bill. This information if not available at the timing of submitting the return the same may be left blank and provided later. This is not required in case of export of services.
Enter the amount of advance received excluding the tax portion.
Enter the amount of advance on which has tax has already been paid in earlier tax period and invoices are declared during this tax period. This amount is excluding the tax portion
Intra-State supplies to registered persons / Inter-State supplies to unregistered persons (Type of Supplies)

Declare the value of supplies made under the 'Nil rated' category for the supply type selected in 1. above. The amount to be declared here should exclude amount already declared in B2B and B2CL table as line items in tax invoice.

SystemProperty.systemPropertyValue: Exempted(other than nil rated/non GST supply)
SystemProperty.description: Declare the value of supplies made under the 'Exempted' category for the supply type selected in 1. above.

Declare the value of supplies made under the 'Non GST' category for the supply type selected in 1. above. This column is to capture all the supplies made by the taxpayer which are out of the purview of GST

HSN Code for the supplied goods or Services. Minimum digit required to be mentioned in the tax invoice.1-Up to rupees 15000000 annual turnover-Nil digit 2. > rupees 15000000 and up to 50000000 annual turnover- 2d 3. > rupees 50000000 annual turnover- 4d
Select the applicable Unit Quantity Code from the drop down.
Enter the total quantity of the supplied goods or Services- up to 2 decimal Digits.
Enter the invoice value of the goods or services-up to 2 decimal Digits.
Enter the total Integrated tax amount collected/payable.
Enter the total Central tax amount collected/payable.
Enter the total State/UT tax amount collected/payable.
Select the applicable document type from the drop down.
Enter the invoice/document series start number.
Enter the invoice/document series end number.
Enter the total no of documents in this particular series.
No of documents cancelled in the particular series.
